## Internet Effect

```{r prep, include=FALSE}
knitr::opts_chunk$set(fig.path='../misc/rmd-', cache.path='../data/cache/rmd-')
load(file = '../data/results.RData') # load results data
load(file = '../data/merged.RData')  # load source  data
library(printr) # load (customised) printr package for clean output of lm()
attach(adulthh)
```

```{r lm4_5pres, cache=TRUE}
lm(h_nfnet ~  interface_intro*setswana_logical + 
              factor(a_edlitrden)  			+
              factor(a_edlitwrten) 			+ 
              factor(a_edlitrdhm)  			+ 
              factor(a_edlitwrthm) 			+ 
              a_woman              			+ 
              hhincome             			+ 
              best_edu)
```
